sticky_transition=”on”]

Build, Manage, and
Grow a Successful Team

Schedule a Demo Today

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_fullwidth_slider][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” disabled_on=”off||” admin_label=”section” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding_tablet=”0px|0|50px|0|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” transparent_background=”off” make_fullwidth=”off” use_custom_width=”off” width_unit=”on”][et_pb_row admin_label=”row” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Powerful Tools” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ text_text_color=”#0079c1″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” module_alignment=”center” use_border_color=”off” border_color=”#ffffff” border_style=”solid”]

Powerful Tools to Achieve Your Vision

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_tabs _builder_version=”4.9.7″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” use_border_color=”off”][et_pb_tab title=”Consumer Websites” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ body_font=”||||” body_line_height=”2em” tab_font=”||||” tab_line_height=”2em” body_line_height_tablet=”2em” body_line_height_phone=”2em” tab_line_height_tablet=”2em” tab_line_height_phone=”2em”]

Stunning Consumer Websites

More than just a pretty design—get brokerage and agent sub-domain websites that deliver value and keep visitors coming back.

  • Large, stunning photos to showcase properties
  • Unparalleled search capabilities
  • Optimized for search engines (SEO & SEM) and lead conversion
  • Mobile first, responsive design
  • Real-time IDX updates/MLS feeds
  • Local market information
  • Neighborhood and school data
  • Comprehensive tools to attract sellers

And while visitors are exploring your websites, valuable search data is collected and added to their contact record in the CRM. BOOM! Now that’s powerful!

[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title=”Leads” _builder_version=”4.9.7″]

Leads, Leads, Leads

Be a lead generating machine

Keep a steady stream of leads flowing to your team with Leads Direct. You only pay for visitors that actually convert to a lead. And with Leads Direct, you’ll get a guaranteed number of leads per month so the team can count on a consistent lead flow.

Connecting with other lead sources

Connect any lead source to Business Suite and enjoy advanced insight on Zillow Group leads with Zillow Tech Connect integration.

Enhanced lead routing

Customize lead routing based on your business needs. Set up lead routing as the traditional round robin method or “best match” which is based on ZIP code, price range, and lead source.[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title=”Robust CRM & Marketing” _builder_version=”4.9.7″ body_font=”||||” body_line_height=”2em” tab_font=”||||” tab_line_height=”2em” body_line_height_tablet=”2em” body_line_height_phone=”2em” tab_line_height_tablet=”2em” tab_line_height_phone=”2em”]

Robust CRM

Insight: Know when your contacts have been on your websites and which properties they’ve viewed or saved.
Speed: Agents can respond quickly with automated system text and email alerts. Plus, complete control over who gets each lead with robust lead routing capabilities.
Analytics: Site activity and website analytics gives you insight into your lead sources, website traffic and conversions.
Lead flow: Get all your leads in one place: Zillow, Trulia, Realtor.com, and other lead sources automatically delivered to your CRM.
Mobile: The mobile CRM app delivers instant lead notifications and allows agents to stay productive while on the go.
Marketing Design: Power your brand with professionally designed print and email marketing pieces, all fully integrated with the CRM. Send to one or send to all!
Marketing Automation: Agents can keep their entire sphere engaged year-round with targeted and automated marketing campaigns.
[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title=”Performance” _builder_version=”4.9.7″]

Accountability and Performance

Individual agent and team performance details help you and your agents achieve greater productivity.

[/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title=”Training” _builder_version=”4.9.7″]

Personalized Team Training and Support

Take solace in a dedicated Account Manager to take you from set-up and implementation to leveraging all of the system tools for accelerated growth.

Beyond product training, we offer unparalleled resources on real estate business strategy and agent best practices to help every agent reach their full potential.

Let’s be honest, if you—and every member of your team—aren’t growing, we aren’t doing our job![/et_pb_tab][et_pb_tab title=”Pricing” _builder_version=”3.19.4″ body_font=”||||” body_line_height=”2em” tab_font=”||||” tab_line_height=”2em” body_line_height_tablet=”2em” body_line_height_phone=”2em” tab_line_height_tablet=”2em” tab_line_height_phone=”2em”]

Pricing Based on Number of Users

You won’t find another system with this much power — and scalability.

Business Suite powers the most successful agents from small teams to multi-state offices with small team pricing available starting with 2-4 users.

Partner Billing
Easily share the cost with a lender or partner using split billing.

How Market Leader Changed My Business

J Michael Manley, Mega Agent and BOLD coach for Keller Williams Realty, Inc., shares how Market Leader helped grow his business by creating a community and a platform to take his team to the next level. With advanced lead tracking and a system for lead follow-up, Market Leader Business Suite was the right the solution for J. Michael and his rockstar team.
